types.html:
vélo-café m (plural vélo-cafés)

  1. a type of food cart mobile vending point, a tricycle-based mobile coffee cart cafe, similar to an ice cream cart tricycle, with the cart hosting an espresso machine, coffee maker, coffee grinder, and supplies

Related terms

[edit]
  • café-vélo
trans: a type of food cart mobile vending point, a tricycle-based mobile coffee cart cafe, similar to an ice cream cart tricycle, with the cart hosting an espresso machine, coffee maker, coffee grinder, and supplies
